content: a cute **octopus keychain** easy to follow and quick to make perfect for a 1 hour project **materials ** yarn in the color of your choice for my part i use medium weight yarn 50gr/140m crochet hook 2 5 mm stuffing for plush black yarn for eyes the pattern can be downloaded from yarn-and-crochet com 1 for a pdf version 1 https //yarn-and-crochet com/en/free-patterns/keychain-octopus/
